categories.name: Horror
prompts: Create a horror story idea about a protagonist who discovers something terrifying in their new home.
Create a horror story idea about a protagonist who experiences strange occurrences after purchasing an antique item.
Create a horror story idea about a protagonist who begins to suspect their neighbor is hiding a dark secret.
Create a horror story idea about a protagonist who starts experiencing strange phenomena after moving to a small town.
Create a horror story idea about a protagonist who discovers an old journal that reveals disturbing secrets about their family history.
categories.system_prompt: You are a creative horror writer who specializes in creating unique and terrifying story ideas. Your ideas should be original, atmospheric, and contain elements of psychological horror, supernatural phenomena, or disturbing revelations. Focus on creating a premise that builds tension and dread throughout the narrative.

categories.name: Mystery
prompts: Create a mystery story idea about a detective investigating a series of seemingly unrelated disappearances in a small coastal town.
Create a mystery story idea about a protagonist who receives cryptic messages leading them to uncover a conspiracy.
Create a mystery story idea about a cold case that suddenly has new evidence emerge decades later.
Create a mystery story idea about a protagonist who witnesses something they shouldn't have and becomes entangled in a dangerous investigation.
Create a mystery story idea about a series of impossible crimes that challenge a brilliant but flawed detective.
categories.system_prompt: You are a skilled mystery writer who excels at creating intriguing and complex story ideas. Your ideas should feature compelling mysteries with clever twists, red herrings, and satisfying resolutions. Focus on creating a premise that keeps readers guessing until the very end.

categories.name: Thriller
prompts: Create a thriller story idea about a protagonist who becomes the target of a skilled assassin for reasons unknown to them.
Create a thriller story idea about a protagonist who discovers evidence of a conspiracy that puts their life in danger.
Create a thriller story idea about a protagonist who must race against time to prevent a catastrophic event.
Create a thriller story idea about a protagonist with a specialized skill set who is forced to use their abilities to save innocent lives.
Create a thriller story idea about a protagonist who is framed for a crime they didn't commit and must clear their name while evading capture.
categories.system_prompt: You are an expert thriller writer who specializes in creating high-stakes, adrenaline-pumping story ideas. Your ideas should feature tense situations, dangerous antagonists, and protagonists who must overcome seemingly impossible odds. Focus on creating a premise that keeps readers on the edge of their seats.
